description:
An economical and compact training board that can be mounted easily over your door frame or just about anywhere. Also a good choice for use as a system training tile.

  • Made of polyester resin
  • CNN milled to be perfectly symmetrical
  • Skin-friendly board tapers from top to bottom for better forearm clearance
  • Instructions, mounting hardware, and workout guide included
  • Sorry, no colour choice
name: Metolius Project Hangboard
